message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your business or life. I am offering this product to you for $15000. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I believe it's a bit steep at $15000. Can we meet in the middle at $12000?
